text:
@GOP Controlled by the left wing mob! That’s the funniest thing I’ve read today. Meanwhile I’ll echo @RobAnderson2018. 

45 is failing at:
🇺🇸Law & order
🇺🇸Ending the coronavirus pandemic
🇺🇸Restoring our economy
